伡字的基本解释

伡
（俥）
chē
船上动力机器的简称：停伡抛锚。
旧指掌握船上动力机器的人：大伡。

伡
（俥）
jū
中国象棋棋子名称，旧时红方的“车”亦写作“伡”。

伡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chē］
“伡1”的繁体字。
(1)船上动力机器的简称。
(2)火车司机或轮船上管理动力机器的人。常尊称为“大俥”。

伡字的康熙字典解释
伡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
伡字的起名意思

暂无。

Yi
Basic explanation of words
Yi
(Like)
chē
The abbreviation for the power machine on board: Stopping and breaking down.
The old refers to the person who masters the power machinery on the ship: Da Ye.
Yi
(Like)
jū
The name of the Chinese chess pieces, the old red "che" was also written as "伡".
Yi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chē]
Traditional characters for "伡1".
(1) Abbreviation for power machinery on board.
(2) The train driver or the person who manages the power machinery on the ship. Chang Zun is called "Dali".
